Negative_Review: I had requested Almond Milk for my wife whilst booking on the websitewhilst booking Which was confirmed but not available That was v v bad I also thought that the rate was inclusive of breakfast It should be more clear
Positive_Review: Did not have breakfast

Negative_Review: When they make up the room they can ensure it is clean they did not pick up the showercap wrappers after they had been used had left the wrappers as it on the table
Positive_Review: The staff was very helpful made sure our comfort was taken care of They were very pre emptive to our needs

Negative_Review: Nothing maybe it s a bit pricey
Positive_Review: The location close to The Arc de Triomphe and Champs Elysees restaurants shops and metro stations Very convenient We watched some of the national day fireworks from our balcony

Negative_Review: I have bought a early checkin and when we arrived our room was not ready We have to wait almost 30 minutes do go to the room In the same day we try to eat something in the bar At 10 10pm I ordered a sandwich and until almost 11 pm it had not yet arrived I canceled my order after knowing that the sandwich machine was in trouble Why did not they tell me that when I ordered the food The hotel don t have a well trained staff Unfortunately Sofitel is out of my list of the best hotels
Positive_Review: The location and the cleanliness
Beds were extremely comfortable bathrooms spacious and modern Loved the Nespresso machine Restuarant in the hotel was excellent food delicious and well presented Staff exceptional
The location was perfect for walking to the Champs Elysee and Arc de Triomphe The rooms were amazing and so comfortable There is pretty of storage and in room coffee station Lovely hotel

Negative_Review: There was no security scanning at the entrance and that was worrying in the light of events in today s world The room was not as spacious as I would have loved or thought going by the booking com description
Positive_Review: The location was excellent for a solo traveler bed was very comfortable

Negative_Review: I was having a very different opinion about Sofitel but this one was not even close to that Most of the experiences were negative a Restaurant staff were very rude and they do not know how to treat the customers b Breakfast options not good very limited and routine c Not much option for Lunch and Dinner d In house restaurant didn t even had veggies for preparing a Salad for a dinner e At 10 30 nothing except a soup was available for dinner in an in house restaurant then hows it a 24 hour restaurant f Doorman staff were not that friendly
Positive_Review: Hmm good question but to be honest it didn t meet my expectation Room service and house keeping was bit ok

We had a wonderful time here The staff was extremely friendly and helpful and attended all of our needs Check in and Check out were swift and uncomplicated The croissants at breakfast were delicious The hotels location near the Champs lys e made it very easy to explore and enjoy Paris We will return here for sure

Negative_Review: We really could not point out anything negative about our stay
Positive_Review: Staff were incredibly helpful and pleasant They really all went out of their way to look after us This really stood out for us

We were the guests of the day at our arrival received beautiful and comfortable room with welcome drink Service is excellent staff is polite and discreet However the room had street view noise was filterd by the windows which ensure us relaxing nights and afternoons in the room I strongly recommend it

Negative_Review: We haven been in dring congress time and the room is far overpriced When sleeping with open window it is pretty loud AC users might not face that problem
Positive_Review: Hotel is very clean and has a nice breakfast

Negative_Review: Low internet speed Massive charge for high usable speed internet Had to wash our own cups think house keeping missed them Room service was of good quality but we had one meal turn up cold and the prices are quite high
Positive_Review: Super comfortable bed Staff were really friendly The staff Spoke better English than me I m English The location right next to the Champs Elysee was ideal for getting out and seeing the city View from room was lovely

Negative_Review: Booking com did not make it clear that I hadn t paid for breakfast with the booking or maybe I made the wrong assumpton I had to pay the difference during checkout Breakfast was a great spread and delicious but quite pricey
Positive_Review: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Sofitel Arc de Triomphe and intend to make it our regular place to stay whenever we visit this great city Particularly liked our junior suite the guest lounge with its books the gym the bar and breakfast

Negative_Review: We had to move rooms because there was bed bugs we had spent an awful lot of money at that hotel and was extremely disappointed
Positive_Review: The staff was lovely great service lovely food in the restaurant

Negative_Review: Not great value specially considering 1000 per night paid for Prestige suite and without even having breakfast included
Positive_Review: Great location small rooms typical of London Paris even whilst being in a junior suite however ended up moving to Prestige Suite after 3 nights with 50 sqm of space but very expensive at almost 1000 per night Great staff and service Dined at their great restaurant Les Cotittes for 4 nights in a row Magnificent food and great cocktails

Negative_Review: Small room even Jr suite was not spacious Breakfast is poor Wi Fi is quite slow
Positive_Review: Good staff Clean rooms Fast service Area is quite and close to everything I would like to stay again here

Negative_Review: Washroom sliding door got jammed and one door couldn t slide any more Couldn t fix it myself and found separation between door and wall dirty from lack of cleaning This is why the facilities and cleanliness parts didn t receive better grades I would rate this a 4 star hotel and not a 5 star
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: In room dining menu can be improved with more casual options Hygiene could be better Automated procedures to welcome guests can be more personalised It was great to have a cake and a letter to wish me a happy birthday but the title was Mr instead of Miss Madame Mademoiselle
Positive_Review: I stayed for my birthday got a nice happy birthday card cake Very nice helpful staff They try their best to understand your requirements regardless of your French language skills The concierge helped me to book dinner in a restaurant that I wanted to try The location is good for those who look for a quiet stay and do not mind walking for few minutes to the Champs lys es Taxis are available easily too and not too expensive

Negative_Review: The Bose sound system is outmoded and can t be used with current generation iPhones without a Lightning to 16Pin adapter
Positive_Review: The location was superb right in the middle of a quiet neighborhood yet not too far from the Arc de Triomphe and the Champs lys es The staff were all excellent and charming The food came in generous amounts compared to most places I ve been to I actually couldn t finish the meal I ordered

Negative_Review: The bed mattress was not great It was a king bed that felt uneven It was higher in the middle and flat on the ends That s what happens to a spring mattress Nothing feels right when your mattress at home is a Tempurpedic Also the room was a little small for a Jr suite but I guess it s normal for Europe
Positive_Review: The staff was excellent Restaurant was amazing Perfect locatiion Overall experience was A

Negative_Review: the rooms are not sound proof you can hear everyone around you after certain hours at night you won t find a person to help you with your staff
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: I don t have anything to complain about
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and welcoming Room was amazingly clean and all facilities were extremely pained greatly Food was also very nicely served

Negative_Review: We did not have electricity for a night temps were sub zero due to unscheduled maintenance Room isolation was poor door of neighbor very loudly heard and can hear neighbor conversation Room was too small
Positive_Review: good location in proximity to Arc and Champs Elysse Comfortable bed Hotel concerned with safety door locked after 1 and need reception to open it

Negative_Review: Small rooms Poor breakfast Room was ready after 2 hours Location far from main attraction No spa Very expensive Poor room cleaning I have to call and request for tooth brush and paste and coffee No view at all
Positive_Review: Nothing
The staff were extremely welcoming and helpful We were overjoyed to hear we were upgraded when checking in which made our trip extra special Location couldn t be better at the centre of everything

Negative_Review: Inadequate Human Resource Management The service level was good in patches good part was that at the checkin they accompanied us to the room On the other hand I had to wait for a long time at front desk to get an additional access card at least 15 minutes and then for conceirge at the time of checkout another 20 minutes so definitely something not to talk about In the end I noticed conceirge focal person came personally to pick the luggage May be staff shortage or poor resource management
Positive_Review: Location

We were warmly welcomed by the check in staff and give a personal tour of the facilities before being taken up to our room Large room with a huge comfortable bed sofa chair and table flat screen TV and a Bose audio system Large en suite bathroom with walk in rainfall shower Nice bar downstairs with attentive staff Didn t frequent the restaurant as went out for breakfast and dinner Expensive but given it s central location not overpriced

The staff was always accommodating and helpful whether we needed help with a reservation or an extra for our room They were patient with our rudimentary French and always willing to speak with us in English When hailing a cab for us they always made sure we could communicate our destination to the driver The room was beautiful and the bed and pillow the most comfortable we have ever had in a hotel The location was wonderful just a few steps from the Arc de Triomphe and Champs de Elysses and just a short cab ride to many of Paris landmarks

Lovely modern hotel situated in a great position close to Champs Elysees and Arc de Triomphe Extremely polite and friendly staff room was spacious with lovely bathroom freestanding bath and spacious shower Bed was the most comfiest hotel bed I ve slept in Would definitely return and can t recommend enough

Let me start with the welcoming team at this hotel The morning Staff were very nice and kind The team are happy to support guide you and give you information the hotel in a great location next to the metro station All in All good value for what you paying for

This one of the best hotel in Paris Has it all excellent staff member there were very cooperative fully equipped room the bath room is full and very convertible I never see like it in Paris very clean room and excellent location

Negative_Review: You can hear everything We had a trouble when sleeping because you can hear everyone and especially the doors slamming The location of the room was horrible it was next to the housekeeping I think
Positive_Review: No Positive

I left my passport in my room The cleaning lady located and informed front desk Front desk located my mobile number from my booking and rang me I made my train This was an excellent example of good training and service Please pass on my thanks

Negative_Review: Was my honeymoon and requested before hand that the room be made more romantic Nothing was done
Positive_Review: Staff were extremely friendly Restaurant part of the hotel was 10 10

I travelled to Paris with my mum for a short break The hotel was beautiful inside and out Perfectly located on a quiet street close to the Arc de Triomphe The room was amazing and bathroom was beautiful The staff were all extremely professional accommodating to all of our needs going out of their way to assist and very welcoming Breakfast in the restaurant was also excellent

Negative_Review: no desk in room no ironing facilities check in clerk mentioned that we got upgraded although we got the room we booked no upgrade
Positive_Review: overall nice stay

Negative_Review: Relatively small rooms Every day several times the electricity lights went out Internet quite slow
Positive_Review: The staff was friendly helpful and professional The rooms have a nice modern touch There is free internet included Quite location but still close to the Champs Elissee and the metro station at the place de Charles de Gaulle

both my wife and I got lost so we went back to hotel later than stipulated time however I was very impressed by the lady probably her name is Louise who told me not to worry and she was so kindly to offer me water as she saw me sweating I really enjoyed such hospitality and shall come back on my next visit

Negative_Review: Rooms were not as spacious as i thought it would be due to the layout like most properties in paris the toilet is separate from the rest of the bathroom
Positive_Review: the staff were super which really makes such a huge difference in any hotel the room and the hotel in general was extremely clean and everything worked the way it should complimentary water everyday was very welcomed i rarely find this in hotels outside the middle east espresso machine in the room was fantastic should be a new requirement to get a 5 star rating if you have a special occasion the hotel is more than happy to help you organize anything ahead of your trip from flowers to chocolates to even reservations

Negative_Review: Not applicable I cannot think of a single thing That s unusual for me as I typically find small details
Positive_Review: Outrageously attentive and accommodating staff They go out of their way to show you a pleasant and enjoyable stay They sent amenities to our room upon hearing my wife was celebrating her 50th birthday Junior suite was amazingly designed in terms of space and storage Well thought out floor plan where every possible amenity is within your reach Fantastic memory foam bed This is very much a five star hotel This stay was the highest standard of hospitality
Location perfect Could not fault anything From arriving the staff were superb and helpful First rate room and very quiet We will definitely come back to this hotel A big thanks to all at the Sofitel

Negative_Review: Suggest offer clients all the signed chits when they pay the bill That way there can be no misunderstanding of items included Even better give them a duplicate at the time the chit is signed
Positive_Review: Excellent welcome on arrival from attentive front door staff Friendly check in from Chloe and Louise Throughout our stay we experienced excellent friendly service and help Staff constantly going out of their way to be helpful Very good English spoken by nearly everyone Very good position for walking around sites of Paris Very good breakfast and again really sweet service Quiet comfortable room of adequate size for 2 people Congratulations and thanks

Negative_Review: Quite expensive but to be expected for this location
Positive_Review: Top quality hotel in a great location Very well sound proofed so very peaceful Excellent service and friendly staff

Negative_Review: There wasn t anything we disliked the room was smaller than I imagined but this in no way impeded our stay
Positive_Review: Fab hotel in a perfect location Food in the restaurant was beautiful and the pillows mattress were like heaven Staff were lovely and friendly and at our disposal throughout This was a surprise for my fiance s birthday not only did they upgrade our room with no charge but they also left a lovely chocolate cake in our room whilst we were out We would definitely recommend

Negative_Review: 150 supplement per night for fold down bed for my daughter when she decided to join me Outrageous Could have bought a few for that Breakfast 34 each Unaffordable
Positive_Review: Location Luxurious Clean

Negative_Review: breakfast quality level and restaurant staff behaviour was like a two star hotel totally restaurant of this hotel is not at the same level of other sections
Positive_Review: location and cleanliness was perfect

Negative_Review: Staff very rude no helpful at all very small rooms I asked cake for my birthday and they gave me rubbish cake No one knows English
Positive_Review: Nothing I liked
The overall look of the hotel the great breakfast and the attendiveness of the staff Great bathroom by the way You made my daughter and me feel pampered thank you Will recommand you
The croissants were flakey and soft on the inside The bed was like sleeping on cloud Totally rocked The staff were nice friendly and very considerate

Location is superb just minutes from the Champs Elysee and the Arc de Triomphe Delighted to be chosen as Guests of the Day to receive a room upgrade to a Junior Suite and drinks at the bar Room service breakfast was plentiful and fresh Service was unparalleled everyone from Monsieur Amine Lekbed Guest Relations Manager to the desk lobby and bar staff all gave outstanding personal service by name Highly recommended hotel and we will definitely be returning next time we are in Paris

Negative_Review: I liked everything the staff were inviting and helpful
Positive_Review: The bedroom was very comfortable the nesspresso coffee maker an excellent bonus in the room hotel location excellent

Negative_Review: the gym the size of the room
Positive_Review: staff are excellent the size of the bath room the room facilities the comfort excellent location quite and close to heart of paris

Negative_Review: The room is a bit small we had a junior suite and still not that spacious
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful location is excellent 5 min walk from chanz and very close to metro station the hotel restaurant great too

Very helpful staff at the front desk at the bar in the restaurant and at the door Everyone was proactive and helpful Good sized room with very comfortable bed Bathroom was big with an excellent shower Really appreciate free WIFI and the Nespresso machine in the room was a nice touch

Negative_Review: Common hallways were a bit shabby and our shower was missing a few mosaic tiles
Positive_Review: Best beds around We came back to our room after dinner and found the bed covered in rose petals and a complimentary chocolate mousse cake as it was our anniversary Staff were always lovely and helpful
Excellent staff Each and every member of staff was cheerful and helpful Nothing was too much trouble and concierge assistance fantastic The bar and cocktails lovely

Negative_Review: Bad customer service when we arrived charged us a deposit of 200 pounds a night and do not tell you this before They simply charged my card without mentioning it Rooms not worth the amount you pay We have stayed in many Sofitel hotels and this was the most basic Won t stay again
Positive_Review: Great location

Negative_Review: 1 The heating was broken for the first 2 nights which made my mum get a cold Initial I thought it was me who didn t know how to use it then they found out it was broken and they fixed it 2 The fridge in the mini bar was broken as well Last 2nd day we bought some gras foie from monoprix and put in the fridge and it all went bad 3 The supply of toiletries is unsatisfactory They provided body cream only for once and condition only for 2 times Normal they only provide shampoo and shower gel 4 on booking I mentioned that I d like to live on a higher floor and quiet room in the end my room was on 1st floor and on the top of the entrance of the hotel
Positive_Review: The bed is comfortable

Negative_Review: Everything else We got a SMOKING room when we requested non smoking and I suffer from asthma respiratory condition The check out took way too long which made it a big rush to the train station and included me missing the train to London The gentlemen helping at the checkout didn t even know the difference between MasterCard and Visa It was all not too 5 star for my liking and got me questioning my booking at the Sofitel Dubai mall
Positive_Review: The location and friendliness of staff
The staff is kind and nice and the location is acceptable The room is not very big while the bathroom is sufficient For me the pillow is not that comfortable

Negative_Review: The door staff were a bit rude because when I checked out and loaded my luggage in the taxi I didn t have any cash on me to tip them One the door staff realised that he slammed the taxi door shut
Positive_Review: The bar staff on Friday evening were extremely pleseant and professional

Negative_Review: Thought room was going to be slightly bigger and requested a bath tub which did not materialise Otherwise very nice
Positive_Review: The bed was fantastically comfortable as were the pillows Heavenly room Nice and quiet had a lovely calming feeling to it Very friendly staff
Staff is absolutely great Convenient location Comfortable and quiet room Great breakfast Great concierges young including ladies great receptionists customer service etc

Negative_Review: Only issue was the iron in the room stained my shirt it was dry cleaned by hotel but stain was not removed Was not a cheap shirt and is now ruined
Positive_Review: Fabulous location so close to walk to Champs Elysees for great food and shopping Staff were very welcoming and helpful rooms a good size and fabulous bathrooms

Negative_Review: It rained that day Not their fault And the Voiturier went out of his way to shield us from the rain and get us taxis etc
Positive_Review: Location is great for Central Paris business and activities staff is incredibly friendly and professional much more than in comparably star rated Parisian hotel nearby and even more so than in other Sofitel hotels I stayed at truly differentiating rooms are good hotel is quiet restaurant is nice and breakfast is exceptionally fresh and enticing so is the restaurant staff Really great And I hardly ever go overboard when it comes to hotels
Fantasic hotel great location and staff were really friendly and went out of their way to help when I left some shirts in the hotel room after I had checked out Will definitely return

Negative_Review: We have ordered two nights in a luxury room with city view and big bathroom including a bath By the check in was everything good till the time we came in to the room It was standard room with small bathroom and the shower only Not the luxury room for 350 night We called the reception and only what they told us was that they are fully booked and they can not do anything Thet was arogant So we checked out after first night and we changed the hotel
Positive_Review: Good location in center

Negative_Review: Charge 100 late check out because leave the room at 13 48 it s absurd and ridiculous I ve been in more than 50 5 hotels and never charge me for late check out it s a low Cust behave for that reason i will never back
Positive_Review: The hotel its very nice and central

Negative_Review: Room size very small and very narrow for a junior suite in pic i did show much bigger room was not available on arrival we waited for more then 2 hours
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: the beds where not explined and therefore a big uncomfortable The pillows where very soft
Positive_Review: The staff where amazing and made visiting France such a pleasure Everyone spoke good english

Negative_Review: The fact that my mother in law was left with no room Basically when we arrived to the hotel we paid for the 2 rooms and check in in only 1 room because the other one wasn t ready but you gave us the access card for it So we left all luggages in mine and left to visit the town We came back late afternoon and surprisingly our room was given to someone else This is really really not professional
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The rubbish in the surrounding streets and the extra Paris taxes the hotel has to levy but there is little the hotel can do about these Had requested a room with a view but it did not materialise Thought the Monday morning restaurant staff seemed a little disorganised compared to previous mornings These are really minor problems though
Positive_Review: The location was nearly perfect

Negative_Review: Nothing I did not like Perhaps only first night you could hear the room next door Possibly due to dry walling Thereafter no problem at all
Positive_Review: Staff were excellent Best in Europe for us Comfort of bed linen Bathroom excellent Attention to detail

Negative_Review: Despite the promise of pillows to suit your needs the person in charge never came to meet us and we didn t get the pillows we wanted right through our 5 day stay
Positive_Review: The location and all the staff the concierge house keeping and in the restaurant were friendly and eager to help Our junior suite was also of a good size
The location of this property is superb It is modern and contemporary which suits my taste Made very welcome when checking in and shown around the hotel facilities

Negative_Review: Poor property gave a room without a shower low end room moved to a room with shower but floor tiles loose bath door stuck closed Not quality property
Positive_Review: Gave free beakfast for our isses experienced

This is our second stay at the Sofitel Paris and it really is a great hotel The beds are super comfortable the room is clean the staff are friendly and helpful and it s in a great location We had the apartment room 601 very nice size very quite good internet connection Good salection of English TV channels We ordered room service for dinner had the pumpkin soup and hamburger both very good

Negative_Review: Would have lobed a better room that the furthest away from the elevator and on the first floor over looking some roof For the money paid i would have expected better
Positive_Review: Very Friendly Staff

Negative_Review: High price for standard superior room Tiny room bathroom and wardrobe uncomfortable pillows either soft or very soft Room master light switch does not turn the night light off unless door key is removed which cuts off all sockets power thus preventing charging any device overnight Tight restaurant s space difficult to move Limited breakfast choices only 4 hot meals offered scrambled egg bacon sausage and mushroom Other types of eggs are chargeable No vegetables or salads only 2 types of cheese offered No dedicated taxi stand for the hotel
Positive_Review: Hotel s location quietness and cleanliness Staff friendliness throughout WiFi speed Comfortable bed not pillows Fruits breads and pastries at the buffet breakfast Bar setup and environment

Negative_Review: That we couldn t change money at the Hotel
Positive_Review: The entire staff but especially the Conceigere Staff and Carlos Also the food was excellent The location is perfect for walking to the sites and restaurants

Negative_Review: the food in breakfast is not at the quality of the hotel they must give non pork eater more options
Positive_Review: very fine hotel specially the feeling of comfort and friendship

Negative_Review: Room service closes at 11 pm they never answer always busy it took a long time to check us in and give us the rooms from 5 pm we went to the rooms 7 30 pm

Negative_Review: When checking in the staff tried to give us two single beds and not the Queen that was reserved After an hour of complaining finally a room was found with the correct bed Very annoying

Negative_Review: Drinks in the bar were expensive however a truly relaxing experience
Positive_Review: Staff extremely attentive friendly and truly professional regarding booking in and out Hotel room was superb with a most comfortable bed and pillows Room was spotlessly clean

Excellent location very close to Champs lys es Arc Di Triomph both within walking distance 5 star to the tee We booked a junior suite the view was beautiful the bathroom was luxurious with the freestanding bath Definitely the most comfortable bed we ve ever slept in at a hotel The staff were most helpful polite Always there to assist make us feel welcome
Nespresso machine bed mattress shower marble air condition bathroom had water hose big safety box daily refill of water tea and coffee
